Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.mediamanagement.mediatypes.series

Class Series

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.mediamanagement.mediatypes.Medium
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.mediamanagement.mediatypes.series.Series
public class Series
extends Medium
Series

Represents a series / TV Show, contains information about the tv-show, the seasons of the show and the episodes of the seasons. Series can be added to media collections

      public Season getSeason​(int seasonNumber, java.lang.String title)

      Returns a season that matches a given season number and title

      Parameters:
      seasonNumber - number of the searched season
      title - title of the searched season
      Returns:
      the season, if it has been found, otherwise null

      public boolean addNewSeason​(int seasonNumber, java.lang.String title)

      Adds a new season to the series

      Parameters:
      seasonNumber - number of the season
      title - title of the season
      Returns:
      true, if the season has been added successfully, otherwise false

    • removeSeason

      public boolean removeSeason​(Season season)

      removes a season from the series, if the season exists

      Parameters:
      season - The season that should be searched within the series
      Returns:
      true, if the season has been removed, otherwise false

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Series series)

      Checks if a given series is equal to the current series

      Parameters:
      series - Series that should be compared to the current series
      Returns:
      true, if name, publication date and network are the same, otherwise false
